page.title: 06My home in Wombourne
page.content: I live in an 8 year old detached house on the edge of the Poolhouse estate. My home has 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a downstairs toilet, a lounge, a dining room,a small study and a large kitchen. I spend some of my spare time in the lounge watching television or a video. Sometimes I listen to music on the hifi or play the piano in the study. We also keep our Spectrum computer there. In the kitchen we have a dryer,fridge, washing machine, cooker and microwave oven. At breakfast time we eat in the kitchen but have our other meals in the dining room. My bedroom is upstairs,next to Mum and Dad's and my sister's.The other bedroom is a spare room. My room was decorated recently in pink. I have a bed which is different.The top part lifts up to give storage space for toys. It is an easy bed to make.I have a continental quilt.
